snippet: The ambassador of Bangladesh objects to a news article about unrest among garment workers.
abstract: Letter from Ambassador Akramul Qader responds to an Aug 24 article on the increased rate of labor protests and violent clashes in Bangladesh.
lead_paragraph: The ambassador of Bangladesh objects to a news article about unrest among garment workers.

headline.main: Workers in Bangladesh: The Ambassador’s View
headline.print_headline: Workers in Bangladesh: The Ambassador’s View
